se.cbb.jprime.seqevo

Class PatternLikelihoods

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.seqevo.PatternLikelihoods
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, org.jfree.util.PublicCloneable

    public class PatternLikelihoods
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.jfree.util.PublicCloneable
    Holds the likelihoods of column patterns across one or more site rate categories for a subtree. Used e.g. by SubstitutionModel.

    For each unique pattern i and site rate category j, there is a vector r. Each element in r corresponds to a state s in the Markov substitution model, representing the probability of the Markov process starting with s at the root of the subtree of interest, and yielding the state pattern corresponding to position i at the leaves of the subtree (under the site rate of category j).

    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand., Bengt Sennblad.
